name: PRINTCRAFT CARD COMPANY, INC. v. Ernest MEDWIG, Appellant, and National Engraving Company, Inc.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: PRINTCRAFT CARD COMPANY, INC. v. Ernest MEDWIG, Appellant, and National Engraving Company, Inc.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed.
Costs on appellant.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MANDERINO, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John L. Laubach, Jr., Kenney, Stevens, Clark & Semple, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Edmund K. Trent, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 459
PRINTCRAFT CARD COMPANY, INC. v. Ernest MEDWIG, Appellant, and National Engraving Company, Inc.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 13, 1975.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
John L. Laubach, Jr., Kenney, Stevens, Clark & Semple, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Edmund K. Trent, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
